title: Current State of the Shipping Wars: Cast Your Votes!
body:
Now that the shipping wars have begun in earnest, it's time for the community to vote for their favorite ships! I have assembled here a list memer ships for your viewing pleasure! Observe them, compare them, and vote for the OTP of the Memes & Games world!

----------------------------------------
(Note: Not in order of preference or popularity)

**Laughing Fish x Laughing Fish** - aka Laughing Fishes
* This is truly the Draven x Draven of the memer world! Who could possibly be more worthy a partner of the Laughing Fish than Laughing Fish?

**Malicious Metal x FeBeast** - aka MaliciousBeast
*Metal and Iron, Morde and Sona - a classic ship that will stand the tests of time!

**Face the Sun x FeBeast** - aka FeSun (pronounced IronSun)
*Although clearly inferior to MaliciousBeast, it does have a pretty epic name. And the two do seem to approve of it, so... who knows?

**Face the Sun x Heretic Lunari** - aka Heretic Sun
*The classic tsundere ship of the Boards! Heresy? Maybe. But love can overcome even the greatest of heresies!

**WorstMorde NA x RaptorKarr** - aka WorstKarr
*With the Lord of Ships at the helm of this relationship, how could this ship possibly sink?

**Airman CompSci x King Odarth** - aka Airman Odarth
*The only truly canon ship of memers - let's see how far this ship can sail!

**Airman CompSci x Malicious Metal** - aka Malicious CompSci
*In-game evidence suggests that this ship could set sail at any time! (Disclaimer: I wasn't actually in that game, so I don't really know what I'm talking about)

**TheTarians x JayHog1992** - aka Tari Hog
*A brisk romance between two yordle mains, fighting for recognition amidst a sea of non-yordle ships.

**Kitty Darkstar x Aqualious18** - aka KittyQualious
*Some people just can't resist Aqualious' "bad boy"/"insane asylum" vibes!

And the final option is to create your own in the comments! There you have it Boards members! Board your favorite ship and set sail to defend it to the death! Let the voting begin!
